summary.para: The EDataFlow enumeration defines constants that indicate the direction in which audio data flows between an audio endpoint device and an application.

remarks.para: The , , , and methods use the constants defined in the EDataFlow enumeration.

summary.para: Audio rendering stream. Audio data flows from the application to the audio endpoint device, which renders the stream.
Audio capture stream. Audio data flows from the audio endpoint device that captures the stream, to the application.
Audio rendering or capture stream. Audio data can flow either from the application to the audio endpoint device, or from the audio endpoint device to the application.
The number of members in the enumeration (not counting the EDataFlow_enum_count member).
